title: Suspect at large after shooting in Richmond's Gilpin Court
content:
RICHMOND, VA (WWBT) -
A Richmond juvenile is recovering in the hospital after a shooting in Gilpin Court Sunday night.
Richmond Police said the juvenile was shot just after 7 p.m. in the 1200 block of St. Paul Street.
Investigators said the shooting likely happened outside, and a motive or suspect description is currently unknown.
The victim’s injuries are expected to be non-life threatening.
Anyone with information about this crime is urged to call Crime Stoppers at (804) 780-1000.
